feed.title: Rohan Das
feed.subtitle: I am a passionate Python coder, who has a good command in HTML and CSS. Also, I am a creative graphic designer and an enthusiastic techie.

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Hello everyone, I am Rohan. I am an 19-year-old guy, who is a passionate Python developer and a Technology lover. I love Minecraft, Linux, Python, Web Development , Mr. Robot and Friends. This website is created using Jekyll. I love to create new stuff from the knowledge I have. You can follow me on my Github to see my current projects.

If you want to know more about me, you can simply contact me using different social media platforms.

Thankyou for reading this blogðŸ˜ƒ.
entry.summary: Hello everyone, I am Rohan. I am an 19-year-old guy, who is a passionate Python developer and a Technology lover. I love Minecraft, Linux, Python, Web Development , Mr. Robot and Friends. This website is created using Jekyll. I love to create new stuff from the knowledge I have. You can follow me on my Github to see my current projects.
